sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './tour-card.css' import { Card,CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price,featured,reviews}=tour const totalRating= reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=> acc+item.rating,0); const avgRating = totalRating ===0 ? "":totalRating===1?totalRating: totalRating/reviews?.length; return (
{featured && Featured }
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
